function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Surrender of control and measurement in field studies","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 pandemic on research validity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Movement restrictions leading to unemployment","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unprecedented national debt from support packages","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Long-term effects on mental health due to pandemic-related unemployment","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pandemic-induced changes in energy use impacting patterns of interaction with energy systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in disentangling the impacts of pandemic measures on energy use","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertain implications for public commitment to low-carbon energy transitions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited focus on context in energy social research","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consistent response by social researchers in addressing contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variability in backgrounds and levels of experience among scholars using social research approaches in energy","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges to the validity of social science energy research presented by the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in prioritizing and justifying measures to account for potential pandemic-related influences","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Constraints such as research plans, budgets, timelines, and labor constraints affecting the ability to address validity challenges","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential exposure to sensitive data categories such as physical or mental health information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased burden on research participants due to additional data collection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential emotional impact of collecting data on sensitive topics heightened by the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of reporting pandemic-related national and local policies during data collection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to report significant changes in pandemic measures during data collection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete representation of pandemic severity and its impacts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Diverse impact of pandemic response measures on individuals and households due to local and national policies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exacerbation of existing social and economic inequalities due to the impacts of the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differential effects of unexpected deprivation from work income on energy-related measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Differentiated impacts on health, income, and employment situation across ethnicities, gender, and income groups","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in behavior and cognitive dimensions due to covid-19 response measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lingering psychological consequences of the covid-19 crisis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to accurately predict changes associated with energy-relevant outcomes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact on research design, sample selection, and data collection due to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pandemic-induced spurious correlation in non-experimental research","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased salience and malleability of manipulated variables in experimental research","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"People required to stay at home leading to higher home energy usage","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Heterogeneous restrictions leading to varied study results","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of longitudinal elements leading to unstable research findings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased influence of distracting factors in online research due to pandemic-related restrictions, potentially impacting data validity.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift towards more online research due to persisting restrictions of in-person contact, potentially affecting the representativeness of the sample.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient consideration of data privacy and confidentiality in new data collection methods","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of contextual factors in research findings and recommendations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for increased exposure to contagious diseases due to longitudinal studies and data collection during and after the pandemic.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Natural experiments may expose different groups of people to varying conditions, potentially leading to increased spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collaboration and convergence research may involve increased interaction and collaboration between different research groups, leading to potential transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Collaboration may lead to increased spread of contagious diseases due to close contact","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of transparency and reproducibility in research practices may lead to misinformation about disease management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imbalance between research coverage of severe problems and ’low-hanging fruits’ may lead to inadequate understanding of disease challenges","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Curtailment of field-based empirical research in regions with severe energy challenges and potential epidemic impact","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited access to diverse perspectives and marginalized populations in scholarly research","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Pressure to publish frequently and focus on short-term impact","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overreliance on highly-cited and high-volume segments of scholarship","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential bias in research focus and coverage due to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exacerbation of existing bias in social research in energy associated with the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Loss of validity in social research in energy associated with the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
